title: Ticket #4954: Master ticket for submit file parser change and new macros
description:
There are a number of tests needed to validate things capable from submit file syntax and parser changes. Include/if-else comes from using config parser. The submit file changes allow script avoidance tools and the new macros provide additional tools at expansion time. For a quick overview see tickets #4819 and #4944 .

  1. Allow whole line substitution for output and queue in SimpleJob.pm #4955
